data.name: Tentacles Party With Nuns
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord!


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1624020/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948470/_/


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1745260/Girls_Cairo_Papyrus/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1755530/_/


About the Game

This is a choice-oriented AVG

Carissa, the most popular nun at St. Esther’s Cathedral, had a dream one night about a witch being abused by the Knights Templar and woke up to find the whole church in a strange atmosphere.

First, she was robbed of her chastity by a tentacle monster that looks like an octopus; her best friend Betsy, who grew up in the orphanage together and took care of her like a dear sister, began to speak coldly and inexplicably; Even Father Benson, the most revered in the church, killed the bishop because of his madness...

The St. Esther’s Cathedral was cursed by a demon that returned from hell and will come to an end in five days. Through the friendship exchange between Betsy and Carissa, the player helps Carissa to get a happy ending in this life and unveils the mystery of the past.

◇Game content:
20 basic CGs, including difference more than 60 pieces
The beautiful and varied drawing style
100,000 words of content
Pure love tentacle game

Carissa

Betsy

data.short_description: Carissa, the most popular nun at St. Esther’s Cathedral, had a dream one night about a witch being abused by the Knights Templar and woke up to find the whole church in a strange atmosphere.
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Thai
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel I5/I7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: Lots of sexually explicit images and descriptions
